trans-unit.source: Gets the gamma ramp on direct color display boards that support downloadable gamma ramps in hardware

seg-source.mrk: Gets the gamma ramp on direct color display boards that support downloadable gamma ramps in hardware

target.mrk: Gets the gamma ramp on direct color display boards that support downloadable gamma ramps in hardware

trans-unit.source: Handle to a device context of the direct color display board in question.

seg-source.mrk: Handle to a device context of the direct color display board in question.

target.mrk: Handle to a device context of the direct color display board in question.

trans-unit.source: Returns the 2D array ([r1, g1, b1], [r2, g2, b2], ... [r256, g256, b256]) that is created by this function, and where the function place the current gamma ramp of the color display board.

seg-source.mrk: Returns the 2D array ([r1, g1, b1], [r2, g2, b2], ...
[r256, g256, b256]) that is created by this function, and where the function place the current gamma ramp of the color display board.

target.mrk: Returns the 2D array ([r1, g1, b1], [r2, g2, b2], ...
[r256, g256, b256]) that is created by this function, and where the function place the current gamma ramp of the color display board.

trans-unit.source: Each element in this array is an integer value with a range from 0 to 65535 which is a mapping between RGB values in the frame buffer and digital-analog-converter (DAC) values.

seg-source.mrk: Each element in this array is an integer value with a range from 0 to 65535 which is a mapping between RGB values in the frame buffer and digital-analog-converter (DAC) values.

target.mrk: Each element in this array is an integer value with a range from 0 to 65535 which is a mapping between RGB values in the frame buffer and digital-analog-converter (DAC) values.

trans-unit.source: Direct color display modes do not use color lookup tables and are usually 16, 24, or 32 bit.

seg-source.mrk: Direct color display modes do not use color lookup tables and are usually 16, 24, or 32 bit.

target.mrk: Direct color display modes do not use color lookup tables and are usually 16, 24, or 32 bit.

trans-unit.source: Not all direct color video boards support loadable gamma ramps.

seg-source.mrk: Not all direct color video boards support loadable gamma ramps.

target.mrk: Not all direct color video boards support loadable gamma ramps.

trans-unit.source: The _WinAPI_GetDeviceGammaRamp() succeeds only for devices with drivers that support downloadable gamma ramps in hardware.

seg-source.mrk: The _WinAPI_GetDeviceGammaRamp() succeeds only for devices with drivers that support downloadable gamma ramps in hardware.

target.mrk: The _WinAPI_GetDeviceGammaRamp() succeeds only for devices with drivers that support downloadable gamma ramps in hardware.

trans-unit.source: Retrieve current gamma ramp and create graph of lookup table (LUT)

seg-source.mrk: Retrieve current gamma ramp and create graph of lookup table (LUT)

target.mrk: Retrieve current gamma ramp and create graph of lookup table (LUT)

trans-unit.source: Your video board do not support loadable gamma ramps.

seg-source.mrk: Your video board do not support loadable gamma ramps.

target.mrk: Your video board do not support loadable gamma ramps.
